name: Bullet Boi
description:
You are trapped with a horde of ferocious carots and blobs. You need to survive but you don't have any weapon. But you are a bullet, then maybe... you could just shoot yourself and survive in this hell of a bullet.

Developed for the Mini Jam #105 by Maxence "Az-steak" Deschamps, Kevin "130N35" Penin

Menu arts by Tiffany Linard

Controls :

  • ZQSD or WASD - Movements
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left click - Dash
  • Space - Jump
  • Escape - Pause
